articles.title: Bitcoin, Crypto Market Bounce Back After Iran-Israel Clash
articles.description: Despite initial volatility sparked by the Iran-Israel clash, Bitcoin and the broader crypto market have shown a recovery.
articles.content: Over the weekend, geopolitical tensions escalated dramatically following an unprecedented conflict between Iran and Israel. The events unfolding on Saturday evening momentarily shook global markets, including the crypto sector. However, there has bee... [2613 chars]

articles.title: Sydney mall stabbing: Police probe why attacker targeted women
articles.description: Australian police are examining why a lone assailant who stabbed six people to death in a busy Sydney shopping mall and injured more than a dozen others.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) — Australian police are examining why a lone assailant who stabbed six people to death in a busy Sydney shopping mall and injured more than a dozen others targeted women while avoiding men, a police commissioner said on Mond... [3500 chars]

articles.title: Will Smith Joins J. Balvin at Coachella for 'Men in Black' Performance
articles.description: Will Smith made a surprise appearance at J. Balvin's UFO-inspired Coachella set on Sunday, performing 'Men in Black' with him.
articles.content: Will Smith made a surprise appearance onstage with J Balvin on Sunday night, dressed in his full “Men in Black” suit and sunglasses and performing the title track of the 1997 film. The appearance was brief but memorable, capping a UFO-themed set and ... [2784 chars]

articles.title: Trump's historic hush money trial begins with jury selection
articles.description: Trump himself casts the case, and his other indictments elsewhere, as a broad “weaponization of law enforcement” by Democratic prosecutors and officials.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) — In a singular moment for American history, the hush money trial of former President Donald Trump begins Monday with jury selection.
It’s the first criminal trial of a former commander in chief and the first of Trump’s four indictments... [5658 chars]

articles.title: Knicks clinch East’s No. 2 seed for NBA playoffs as matchups shake out
articles.description: The final day of the season finally brought some clarity to the NBA playoffs. The play-in games tip off Tuesday, and the first round starts Saturday.
articles.content: The NBA’s playoff bracket and play-in tournament field finally took shape Sunday when all 20 postseason-bound teams completed the regular season. With the top-seeded Boston Celtics waiting to see how the Eastern Conference bracket would shake out bel... [4049 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s Criminal Trial Begins With Vitriol and 42 Questions
articles.description: It’s been a long wait, but Trump’s Stormy Daniels trial in Manhattan finally starts on Monday. His lawyers tried their best to kill it, delay it, and pare it down. They failed.
articles.content:
After seven years, three tell-all books, two trips to the Supreme Court, and one historic indictment, Donald Trump is finally—officially—the first former American president to stand trial on criminal charges.
For the next two months, Trump’s 2024 pre... [10905 chars]

articles.title: Top military commandr Syrskyi says front-line operational situation ‘deteriortating’
articles.description: Col. Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi said more fortifications are being built in the Kyiv-controlled part of Donetsk Oblast to halt Russian advances.
articles.content:
The commander-in-chief of Ukraine’s armed forces, Oleksandr Syrskyi, says the front-line situation is “deteriorating” along the scarred frontier of the eastern part of the country.
Russian forces are advancing toward Chasiv Yar, 9.3 miles west of the... [3196 chars]

articles.title: Man shot and killed after car crash in NW Miami-Dade
articles.description: Police said an argument between two drivers after a car crash ended with one man shot.
articles.content:
A man was shot after a car accident in Northwest Miami-Dade on Sunday, police said.
